name: Parrot's Plushies
description: Adds an assortment of craftable plushies to Minecraft
extendedDescription:
This mod adds an assortment of colorful plushes to the game!

As of version 1.1.2 these include: **Parrot Plush, Feather Plush, Pusheen Plush, Kirby Plush, Steve Plush, Akaash Plush, Donutz Plush, Lucid Plush, TwO Plush,** and more to come!

The mod also adds a set of unique weapons, such as: **Charged Broadsword, Crimson Katana, Fool's Gold Blade, Diamond Destroyer, Copy Sword, Toxic Sword, Zulfiqar, Featherblade, Novice and Elite Bone Scythes, Duskgold Blade, Shadow Blade,** and maybe more soon!

These weapons are crafted using the new **Soul Upgrade Smithing Template**, used to upgrade some netherite tools with various materials.

As of version 1.2.1, the mod fully supports **Better Combat** so you can use the.
